subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: John Madden scored two goals and goalie Martin Brodeur made several important saves in the final minutes Sunday to help the Devils hold off the visiting Toronto Maple Leafs, 3-2.
snippet: John Madden scored two goals and goalie Martin Brodeur made several important saves in the final minutes Sunday to help the Devils hold off the visiting Toronto Maple Leafs, 3-2.
